author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Army Recruiting Office has invited male applicants from Krishnagiri, Dharmapuri, Salem, Namakkal, Erode, Tirupur, Coimbatore, The Nilgris, Dindigul, Madurai and Theni districts for the post of religious teachers such as Pandit, Granthi and Padre.

The age limit for the civilian candidates is 27-34 and for the re-mustered is 25-34 as on February 4, 2016.

The applications are available atwww.joinindianarmy.nic.in/and the last date of submission is January 20, 2016. The written examination for the candidates will be conducted at the Army Recruiting Office, Secunderabad, on February 28, 2016.
